colorDepth.label: Color Depth
colorDepth.description: A number, representing the bit depth of the color palette for displaying images in your browser.

canvas2D.label: Canvas fingerprint
canvas2D.description: Two images are drawn inside of your browser with the help of html canvas. Rendering images can be different on different computers, this can be used to identify you.

canvasWebGL.label: WebGl Fingerprint
canvasWebGL.description: Image drawn inside your browser with the help of your graphics card. There are different results for different hardware configurations.

audioContext.label: Audio fingerprint
audioContext.description: The audio fingerprint uses the Web Audio API to sample a sound. Differences in hardware can lead to different sampling values, and thus identify your computer.
